attributes.action: Change the English and Welsh Conveyancing System
attributes.additional_details: Having been let down by someone at the bottom of a chain of 4, after 6 months of waiting for exchange, the knock on effect on the other 3 is devastating
attributes.background: The Scottish System is binding, and I think it should be adopted by all nations of the Uk.   Once an offer is accepted on a property it should not be possible to renege on that agreement without penalty.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action: 

Introduce conveyancing laws similar to those in Scotland, across England & Wales
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709395
